thread.title: Hashtag calls for Star Wars boycott - KOTA-TV Rapid City
thread.title_full: Hashtag calls for Star Wars boycott - KOTA-TV Rapid City - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: KOTA-TV Rapid City
title: Hashtag calls for Star Wars boycott - KOTA-TV Rapid City
text:
Some of those using the hashtag are claiming "Star Wars: The Force Awakens" is "promoting white genocide," as tweeted by an account called End Cultural Marxism. Another account, called Critical Spooking, tweeted the hashtag and said the new film is "nothing more than a social justice propaganda piece that alienates it's core audience of young white males."
 KOTA-TV Rapid City.
